author: Shane Brinkman-Davis Delamore, Imikimi LLC
description: Select, configure and extend your to-JavaScript compiler, with arbitrary code, on a per file bases from within the file.
name: caffeine-mc

scripts.build:
git checkout source/
coffee --output source --compile source-source &
caf -p -c source-source -o source &
wait
cd source-source
find . -name '*.js' | cpio -vpdm ../source
cd ..
nn -s
scripts.build-clean:
rm -rf source-building
mkdir source-building
git checkout source/
coffee --output source-building --compile source-source &
caf -p -c source-source -o source-building &
wait
cd source-source
find . -name '*.js' | cpio -vpdm ../source-building
cd ..
nn -s
rm -rf source
mv source-building source
nn -s
